website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its fun carrying case and the high quality of its quick release bow compass.
pros: Comes with a wide range of rulers, squares, a protractor, and a quick release bow compass
cons: The compass case cracks easily either through use or in transit
Protractor and ruler are on the smaller side

customer_reviews.title: It arrived early ( today in fact) and is in great shape. I ordered it as it looked very ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this for my Granddaughter who is starting into the 6th grade this year. It arrived early ( today in fact) and is in great shape. I ordered it as it looked very sturdy for use and looks like it will hold up for a good long while to come. She is excited about having it ,though she may not need every feature this set holds . Anyway,if not now then may-hap in the future some of the others will come into being handy. I would definitely order another one should she need one as it is the best set I've seen advertised out there and does not cost you the house rent or car payment to buy, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Roe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Stuff, Compass is Clumsy and Difficult to get accuracy consistently
customer_reviews.text: I like most components in this kit, but find the compass to be a bit clumsy.. the arms have hinges, which is a good function, but they bend too easily, tried tightening them, dis t work.. wish it didnt have this function and would just stay straight. Aside from that, the wooden pencils have shoddy eraser clamp things, very loose and thus crap to use, lead breaks when sharpening.. all in all im not surprised, but this set got loads of 5star reviews... honestly you get what you pay for, this stuff is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jp B

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Locking protractor - very nice mechanism. The entire set is really great! Purchased for our daughter for geometry class.....she’s been using the protractor to create art projects this summer! I’m extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: married2abikeguy

customer_reviews.title: Appears durable
customer_reviews.text: This set of geometric tools is a recent acquisition, so i do not truly know how durable they are. Although, the materials appear to be made from sturdy materials, especially the compass. One exception is the case the compass was packed in, the lid was broken, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: perfect set
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this set--it is everything I need plus a nice bag to keep the tools in--handy and it is pretty with the nice design on the front. The quality surprised me for the price. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good kit for school
customer_reviews.text: The products are good for the price. Not the most sturdy products, but if you don’t throw them around, they should last a while. The protractor, triangles, and ruler are small, and the case the compass comes in is plastic and cracks easily. Overall, a good kit for school.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: If you're a college student this set is too small.
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough for college needs, it's a cute package but lacks the size to be useful for geography and geometry. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Eveything was what my college student needed except the portractor and ruler was not big enough. But it was worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of tools.
customer_reviews.text: As a Swedish-American the 'Viking' grabbed my attention. It is exactly what I expected, wanted, and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Basic set with decent sturdy compass with longer arms for larger drawing.
customer_reviews.author: DarthVarner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality as well
customer_reviews.text: The set is complete and the price was reasonable, Good quality as well. Thank you Ferocious Viking, this set is perfect for the CNC/drafting class Im enrolled in
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Bim

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than most I've ever seen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and packaging. Definitely worth the price. I made a video on my tiktok about it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerramy

customer_reviews.title: Looks heavily used
customer_reviews.text: My compass came broken and on top of that the rulers all had scratches and weird unremovable smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters geometry class and although she hasn’t used it yet, I am very impressed with the kit. I think it is a great value for all of the quality products that were included.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: One of the joints don't lock, rendering the compass unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The compass itself was completely unusable due the the fact that the arms have a joint that can't lock. I garentee that you not gonna get a precise measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Whittier

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, compass and tote broke in a short time
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality, compass fell apart in about a month. Zipper on tote broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: A complete set at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: The bag and plastic container keep the set together and ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: WHR

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really a great value for the money. The pouch that came with it was a surprise, I might not have read it in the description but having sturdy pouch to keep everything together helps so much! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Compact and in order
customer_reviews.text: I just got these from the mail. I glanced through the set and so far I’m impressed. It’s perfect for my little sketches and maps. And the zip bag is just the ticket. Thanks and good service receiving also
customer_reviews.author: brandon hambright

customer_reviews.title: Protractor and compass set
customer_reviews.text: All pieces are of high quality. Will be an valuable addition to my shop toolset.
customer_reviews.author: James Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I can draw up a storm. Must will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The only "sort of" bad thing about this product
customer_reviews.text: The only "sort of" bad thing about this product, which probably has nothing to do with the company, was the little plastic case the set came in was cracked. I will definitely buy it again when my son gets to the age of needing it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits the purpose
customer_reviews.text: As an overall is good; however, the mechanical pensils are very fragile and the graphite that comes in the package is always breaking due to poor quality. The compass is really good and the rulers
customer_reviews.author: Catarina Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the quality of this product. Worked out great for my sons drafting class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price you're getting a pretty decent tool
customer_reviews.text: For work I do a lot of blue print drawings. This is a nice set, with the exception of the compass. The adjustment mechanism on it is a little finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great customer service and quality product
customer_reviews.text: quality product and wonderful customer service. looking forward to this set being used for my son's geometry class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would say yes to purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was an excellent value. I have been enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 8th grade son is a taking geometry this year and this set is exactly what he needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: 3 star
customer_reviews.text: All good except the compass. Compass is hard to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk! save your 19$
customer_reviews.text: The rulers are so light and cheap. The print fell down. Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my budding artist of a nephew. At 7 years old, he puts them to the test, and I am proud to say they are still going strong. Great product, and a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Snowball

product_meta.title: Protractor and Compass Set with Ruler, Set Square, Protractor, Compass for Geometry, Pencils, Pencil Case, Mechanical Pencil, Pencil Sharpener, Eraser and Lead
product_meta.description:
►School Set for School Start

This set is perfect for the student that is starting in school and need the basic supplies to get along. But only buy this set if you want the student to have that extra edge that quality tools can give. Also perfect for the student that got a cheap set on the first day of school and saw it all break in the first week. Let’s face it, this set just is BETTER. 

►Perfect for Math Work 

Whether you are taking geometry classes or just need to make the occasional pie chart, having the ability to create accurate, drawings with a precision instrument is a must for the serious student. When bisecting angles or constructing geometrical figures, you want a compass you can rely on.

►Everything you need in one set 

In this set you will get everything you need to get along in class or on the job. No need to shop 16 different amazon sellers, when you can get everything in one cool set here. These 16 different items are all you need to get stellar grades in Math, Science and Engineering classes. 

►Quality unheard of in a School Start Set

The quality of the items and the compass in this set is over and beyond what is normally found in similar sets. The compass along is of a quality rarely seen in school sets and will give you an extra edge when it comes to Math and Geometry class, Drafting and artistic drawing.
feature_bullets: ALL THE MATH TOOLS YOU NEED IN ONE SET – Do your math problems done with a set that has it all.
IT WILL LAST ALL YEAR - High quality drafting tools in study canvas bag with math compass
YOU DESERVE THE BEST - These math tools and the compass is very strong and good for precision work
GOOD GRADES – comes from hard work with quality equipment like these geometry tools
NEVER WORRY ABOUT HAVING WHAT YOU NEED - this math set will get the job done, guaranteed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
